[[File:Minecraft me command in chat.png|alt=Message "* Steve was eaten by a grue" in chat|thumb|width=296x296|Command output of<code>/me was eaten by a grue</code>]]
Broadcasts a narrative message in third person.

== Syntax ==

* '''Java Edition'''
: <code>me <action></code>

* '''Bedrock Edition'''
: <code>me <message: message></code>

== Arguments ==

{{argument|action|message|reason: message|CommandMessage}}
: Specifies the message to display.
: {{arg desc|je=message|be=CommandMessage}}

{{Result table}}
{{Result table|The command is incomplete, or any argument is not specified correctly.|unparseable|unparseable}}
{{Result table|succeed}}
{{Result table}}

{{Output table}}
{{Output table|edition=je|On success|1|1|1}}
{{Output table|edition=be|On success|1}}
{{Output table}}

== Example ==

: <code>/me was eaten by a grue</code>

Outputs your name followed by the string " ''*[Player]'' ''was eaten by a grue''" - if your name is Steve: ''" *Steve was eaten by a grue"''
